altername_name: Ma Jiang Qing Ren: Ji Ma Jiang Zhi
Má Jiàng Qing Rén: Jí Má Jiàng Zhì
name: Ma Jiang Qing Ren: Ji Ma Jiang Zhi
overview: Ma Jiang Qing Ren: Ji Ma Jiang Zhi (麻将情人-姬麻将之) is an unlicensed pornographic mahjong game developed by Creaton Softech for the Sega Mega Drive and released in 1995.
